name: 2D platformer (Raoul)
description:
This is a single player game, but you have to play it with someone in the room.

The goal of the game is to satisfy the Zoekelfloenk. However, if you get caught by the person in your room you lose. Hide your original goal by playing the platformer in the game.

Satisfying the Zoekelfloenk works by eating the clouds. Wake the zoekelfloenk with L-shift and eat with mouse.
